sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'
import { Segment, Grid, Container, List, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react'

export default function Footer() {
    return (
        <>
            <Segment style={{ position: "static", bottom: 0, padding: "20px", width: "100%" }}
            >
                <Container>
                </Container>
                <Grid divided stackable>
                    <Grid.Row>
                        <Grid.Column width={3}>
                            <Header> Linkler</Header>
                            <hr />
                            <List link >
                                 <List.Item as={Link} to="/">Ana Sayfa</List.Item>

                                 <List.Item as={Link} to="/">Giris Yap</List.Item>

                                 <List.Item as={Link} to="/">Kayit Ol</List.Item>
                            </List>
                        </Grid.Column>
                        <Grid.Column width={3}>
                            <Header> Referanslar</Header>
                            <hr />
                            <List link >
                                 <List.Item as="a" href="https://www.kodlama.io">Kodlama.io</List.Item>
                            </List>
                        </Grid.Column>
                        <Grid.Column width={7}>
                            <Header> İnsan kaynakları yönetimi</Header>
                            <hr />
                            <List link >
                                 <List.Item as="a" href="https://www.kodlama.io">Kodlama.io</List.Item>
                            </List>
                        </Grid.Column>
                    </Grid.Row>


                </Grid>

            </Segment>
        </>
    )
}
